description:
# Import Data from Spreadsheet

In ERPNext, you can easily migrate your historical data using spreadsheets. You can use it for migrating not just masters (like Customer, Supplier, Items), but also for transactions like (outstanding invoices, opening stock and accounting entries, etc). If you are migrating from [Tally](https://tallysolutions.com/) or [Quickbooks](https://quickbooks.intuit.com/in/), we got special migration tools for you.
name: Data import
title: Import Data from Spreadsheet
